|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 1 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, VGA out, power switch, metal case, heat sink |addchip = Hardware Monitoring IC;Novoton;NCT7802Y;;1;,,, RS-232 Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM213;;1;,,, FPGA;Lattice Semiconductor;LCMX02-1200UHC;;1;,,, 2Kbit I2C 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C02D;;1;,,, 4-Bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Shifter;TI;TXS0104E;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel NexFET Power MOSFET;TI;CSD17304Q3;;1;,,, 25V N-Channel NexFET Power MOSFET;TI;CSD16414Q5;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel NexFET Power MOSFET;TI;CSD17507Q5A;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel NexFET Power MOSFET;TI;CSD17505Q5A;;5;,,, Synchronous Buck NexFET Power Block;TI;CSD87350Q5D;;4;,,, 3V-28V D-CAP Synchronous Buck Controller;TI;TPS53219A;;3;,,, 4.5-18V 3A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS54326;;3;,,, 30V P-Channel HexFET Power MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si4435DY;;1;,,, 8-Bit Bidirectional Level-Shifting Voltage Translator;TI;TXS0108E;;2;,,, Dual Channel (3-Phase CPU/1-Phase GPU) SVID, D-CAP+ Step-Down Controller for IMVP-7 Vcore;TI;TPS59641;;1;,,, PWM DC/DC Controller for GPU Core-Voltage Regulator;Renesas;ISL95870B;;1;,,, 1A Low Dropout Voltage Regulator;GlobalTech;GS1117AX;;1;,,, 3-lane,3-port PCIe Gen2 Switch;PLX Technology;PEX8603;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none

|availability = EoL |eoldate = 08/17/2022 |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Intel Atom]]'' Dual-Core (@1.46GHz) *Memory: 2GB DDR3L (SODIMM) RAM *Storage: 8MB Quad SPI Flash, :64GB Transcend SSD *Network: 4x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 3.33A via barrel
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/sophos/sophos_xg105_rev_2 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = x86 |subtarget = 64 |arch = x86_64 |support_started_version = 21.02.1 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
